Comment.value: M2Q2CC_PLTOVER Arises if the golem has already given the player the key to the first seal.
M2Q2CC_PLTDONE - if the golem has spoken to the player before.
M2Q2CC_GIVEKEY - the golem gives the key to the player. Sets a global variable so the golem will recognize the player if he sees him again, and remember that he's given out the key.
M2Q2CC_GIVEKEY - the golem gives the key to the player. Sets a global variable so the golem will recognize the player if he sees him again, and remember that he's given out the key.

M2Q2CC_GOLEMPLT1 - if the player has never spoken to the golem before to get the plot.
This golem will give the player the key to the door he guards if the player brings him the signet ring from M2Q2CC, of if you speak Creator tongue to him (finding the scroll in CD - unlikely at this point but possible), or if you kill him, you can take it from him.

LinkComment.value:
M2Q2CC_PLTRING if player has the ring.
M2Q2CC_GIVE RING gives the golem the ring.

M2Q2CC_PLTRING if player has the ring.
M2Q2CC_GIVE RING gives the golem the ring.

Comment.value: M2Q2CC_PLTSTRT - sets a global variable so the golem will recognize the player the next time they speak.

LinkComment.value:
M2Q2CC_PLTRING if player has the ring.
M2Q2CC_GIVE RING gives the golem the ring.

M2Q2CC_PLTRING if player has the ring.
M2Q2CC_GIVE RING gives the golem the ring.

Comment.value:
M2Q2CC_PLTRING if player has the ring.
M2Q2CC_GIVE RING gives the golem the ring.
M2Q2CC_PLTSCROLL - if the player has read the Creator scroll in M2Q2CD.
